living_room.description: A comfortable area for socializing and relaxing, featuring seating and workspaces.
living_room.couches: Comfortable seating area for relaxation and casual conversations.
living_room.desk: Work area for studying, reading, or using electronic devices.

dinning_room.description: The designated space for dining and gathering, centered around a table.
dinning_room.entrance: Entry point to the dining area from adjacent rooms.
dinning_room.table: Central dining surface for meals and family gatherings.

kitchen.description: A practical area for food preparation and storage with dedicated stations.
kitchen.table: Surface for food preparation and quick meals.
kitchen.shelve: Storage area for dishes, cookware, and pantry items.
kitchen.sink: Washing station for dishes and food preparation cleanup.
kitchen.beverages: Dedicated area for drink storage and preparation.

bedroom.description: A private area designed for rest and personal time, featuring a bed.
bedroom.bed: Sleeping area for rest and relaxation.

entrance.description: The entry point of the home, welcoming guests and transitioning between spaces.

start_area.description: An initial or transitional zone upon entering the property.
